comment: Hey is very egotistic. Glad I will never have another class with him again. He is so rude, beware!

I only signed up for the class because I needed to fill a space. The class itself was interesting. Professor Klitenic is definitely interesting as well! I say pay attention to the class material, review his notes and powerpoints, come to class, participate, and be respectful and there won't be any problems!

Don't listen to previous posts. People are too sensitive and take it too personal. It is a communication class and he critiques your speech immediately after, that is why it is a communication class.. he is teaching you to communicate better. He is funny and really nice. He also is easy to get a hold of via email. Would take again.

Prof. Klitenic teaches a dynamic class. Attendance and participation are a must: he can bump you a grade for it. If you read the textbook, participate in class and review the powerpoints before test you will do fine. If you dread speaking in public don't take the class. Do what you're told and you'll do well

Since I have been attending KSU this is the most disturbing class I have been in. The students are called out in class and berated by this below par instructor. Often forgetting his notes for class and not checking his e-mails. He has latched on to several students and made them favorites. This class is a trainwreck. DO NOT TAKE THIS CLASS.
Don't take the class, never thought I would say that but he is a horrible professor! If you want to be embrassed in front of your classmates take the class.

Klitenic is quite the stereotypical jock, only instead of being in high school where it's moderately acceptable to full of yourself, he's a professor. He doesn't know the material AT all and simply says what he feels is adequate based off of ppts. His grading is VERY subjective even on tests. Makes fun of students for attending KSU. seriously??
An awful teacher. He is full of himself, he cant keep up with grades and test. He LOST test. He was a joke! If you got him DROP THE CLASS
For some reason every bad review that was entered here was removed. Let me summarize: NOBODY was happy with Klitenic. Pretty much, just do NOT take him.
Don't take the class from Klitenic.

Well, In the beginning I thought that Klitenic was going to be a great teacher. He is very entertaining and the three hour class felt like just an hour. HOWEVER.. He is UNFAIR in the way he grades. He will take a point off here and there according to the way he feels at the moment. DO NOT TAKE HIM!!!!

What can I say about Uncle Stu? egocentric, egoistic, egomaniacal, egotistic, egotistical, grandstanding, inward-looking, know-it-all, narcissistic, on an ego trip, self-absorbed, self-indulgent, self-interested, self-involved, self-seeking, self-serving, and I mde a B.  Most are not that lucky.

He is by far the worse professor ever! He loses EVERYTHING and then just makes up a grade for you "because he knows how everyone did." He is a complete jerk and loves to embarrass people. I would not ever take another one of his classes.
True/False questions are supposed to be cut and dry. In this class they are not. And just becuase the book clearly states something is false doesnt mean it will be on the test. Just a heads up
